title: DoubleSwap
author: DoubleSwap
content: Hello dear members of the BitcoinTalk forum!We are excited to announce that we are launching a brand new project for electronic currency exchange.In light of this, we are running a special promotion exclusively for forum participants. Registered members who have been part of the forum for at least 7 months are eligible to participate.The terms of the promotion are simple: The very first person who completes an exchange of at least 100 USDT using the following directions:Tether TRC20 USDT → USDCoin TRC20 USDCTether TRC20 USDT → USDCoin ERC20 USDCTether TRC20 USDT → Tether ERC20 USDTTether TRC20 USDT → Tether BEP20 USDTTether ERC20 USDT → USDCoin TRC20 USDCTether ERC20 USDT → USDCoin ERC20 USDCTether ERC20 USDT → Tether TRC20 USDTTether ERC20 USDT → Tether BEP20 USDTTether BEP20 USDT → USDCoin TRC20 USDCTether BEP20 USDT → USDCoin ERC20 USDCTether BEP20 USDT → Tether TRC20 USDTTether BEP20 USDT → Tether ERC20 USDT will receive a special bonus of 25 USDT. The processing time for the request is 30-120 minutes.To participate in the promotion, please follow these steps:1. Create a request on our website and make the payment.2. When contacting our operator, provide the request number and mention that you are participating in the "Giveaway of $25" promotion.3. After a successful exchange, post a review in the dedicated thread on our forum, preferably with a screenshot confirming the exchange.4. Once your review has been verified, you will receive 25 USDT directly to your wallet.Don't miss out on the opportunity to receive an additional bonus by participating in our promotion. We look forward to receiving your requests and reviews!Best regards,DoubleSwap TeamOur contacts:https://doubleswap.ru - websitehttps://t.me/doubleswap_crypto - Telegram channelhttps://t.me/doubleswap - Telegram supportadmin@doubleswap.ru - email

comments.author: Best_Change
comments.body: Exchanger doubleswap.ru has been added to our monitor BestChange.We have analyzed information about the service’s work, its reputation, principles, and values of its administration and came to the conclusion that doubleswap.ru  satisfies the criteria for a reliable partner and can be listed in BestChange, among other exchangers.We sincerely hope for productive and long-term cooperation with this service. Despite the successful passing of all the checks, we will keep an eye on its reputation and the development of the client service.We recommend you always check the review page https://www.bestchange.com/doubleswap-exchanger.html After an exchange, please share your opinion about the provided service with others.
